page.title: 16Sport and Fitness in 1985
page.content: We sent questionnaires to 150 houses and got 119 replies. There were 460 people altogether. We asked questions about watching and playing sport. Only 36 people go to watch it regularly but 143 people watch it regularly on TV. 149 people never watch sport at all. 303 people take part in sporting events once a week or more and 267 people do it sometimes. Only 41 people don't do any sport. Two of our questions were about healthy eating and sponsored events. 128 people have tried to lose weight during the year. 221 people have taken part in sponsored events.
